TableExtractDefinition.WhereClause: (INSTITUTION_NUMBER,SERVICE_ID) in (select INSTITUTION_NUMBER,SERVICE_ID from CBR_ASSIGNED_SERVICES where service_contract_id in ('111') and SERVICE_CATEGORY='002')
(INSTITUTION_NUMBER,index_field) in (select INSTITUTION_NUMBER,SERVICE_ID from CBR_ASSIGNED_SERVICES where service_contract_id in ('111') and SERVICE_CATEGORY='002')
service_contract_id in ('111')and ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID in ('009','012') and ACCT_CURRENCY='978' and POSTING_METHOD in ('001','999')
service_contract_id in ('111') and acct_currency='978' and ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID in ('009','012')
service_contract_id in ('111') and acct_currency='978' and ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID in ('009','012') and SETTLEMENT_METHOD in ('010')
service_contract_id in ('111')and ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID in ('009','012') and ACCT_CURRENCY='978' and CLIENT_FEE_ID in ('519','520','524','525','515')
ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID in ('009','012','000') and service_contract_id in ('111','000') and not ('000' = service_contract_id and '000' = ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID) and gl_acct_currency='978'
